TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TransportType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration that sets the messaging protocol to either NetMessaging (a proprietary protocol to Azure Service Bus) or AMQP (an industry standard).
Docs.remarks: Although NetMessaging is the default value, AMQP is the preferred protocol. No matter which transport type you select (NetMessaging or AMQP), the communication occurs over the selected . For example, you can have AMQP occur over TCP or HTTP(S).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.TransportType Amqp = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP) transport type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.TransportType NetMessaging = int32(0)
